nodes.text: Keran Vondi was a female Human member of the Republic Navy and the gunnery officer of the Brentaal Star.

If the player is a female Trooper in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, then Ava Jaxo invites Jorda Pell and Vondi to her apartment along with the player; however, if the player is male, the player meets up with Jaxo alone.
If the Trooper chooses to save the prisoners at Colony A-77 at the cost of Agent Jaxo's life, the Trooper receives a message from Vondi with a companion gift.
